N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 2.24 - Personnel-hand-washing facilities-item 17r

State Regulations

The following hand-washing facilities are
required: (a) Hand-washing facilities
are located in the milkhouse and in or convenient to the milking barn, stable, parlor or flush toilet. (b) Hand-washing facilities include soap or detergent, hot and cold or warm water, individual sanitary towels and a lavatory fixture. Utensil wash and rinse vats
shall not be considered as hand-washing facilities. (c) Such facilities are to be kept in good
repair, clean, and shall not be used for storage. Notes
